name: Wings of Iron
description:
In Wings of Iron you will pilot your fighter jet against two experimental weapons. 

The Heavy Ordinance Aerial Platform (HOAP) is a Helicopter capable of firing multiple deadly projectiles and withstanding heavy damage. You will have to engage it in an aerial dogfight. 

The New Age Anti-Aircraft Zodiac Kinematic Array (NAAZKA) is an megastructure consisting of three magnet propulsion turrets. You will have to locate and destroy their power supplies in order to render them inoperable.

If these new weapons are allowed to run rampant then mass destruction is sure to follow, you must destroy them whatever the cost.
